January 17, 2019 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pks-azure-multi-cloud-kubernetes?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> PKS 1.3 is Now GA! PKS 1.3 is now GA, delivering Kubernetes 1.12, Azure support, and a full deck of enterprise capabilities across networking, availability, and operations.
